Ubuntu-touch.name: Ubuntu-touch
Ubuntu-touch.description: Loaded at the request of the author from https://www.opendesktop.org/s/Cinnamon/p/1012724/

Spearmint-Leaf.name: Spearmint Leaf
Spearmint-Leaf.description: The goal of this theme was to combine Spearmint theme by razor020 with MintLeaf theme by luisrafaelgalvez and this is the result

Discreet-Flat.name: Discreet Flat
Discreet-Flat.description: A dark theme designed to get the best out of flat design, without harming usability

Chinvat.name: Chinvat
Chinvat.description: This theme is missing an info.json

Tyr-himinn.name: Tyr himinn
Tyr-himinn.description: Simple and sleek theme for Cinnamon in two variants: green (jord) and blue (himinn)

Graphite-Zero.name: Graphite-Zero
Graphite-Zero.description: Dark gradient theme. Green tinged applet mouseover. Monochrome menu wording that uses only shadow highlighting for comfortable menu scrolling.  Credit to theme Double Down by Frankula and Dewman 12.  Theme Graphite-One is a completely monochrome version of this.

Faded-Dream.name: Faded-Dream
Faded-Dream.description: Faded-Dream is a simple yet elegant theme designed to bring a clean glass-like transparency to the Cinnamon desktop.

Minty.name: Minty
Minty.description: Minty is a Cinnamon theme with some flavour of Linux Mint

LM-Light-Panel.name: LM-Light-Panel
LM-Light-Panel.description: Linux Mint theme with reversed panel colors, slightly improved composition, and menu edits.

CBlue.name: CBlue
CBlue.description: A semi-transparent Cinnamon theme, with wallpaper + Firefox extra and Conky (see \'more info\' for details). Inspired by the CBlack theme.

Kiss-Kool-Viper.name: Kiss-Kool-Viper
Kiss-Kool-Viper.description: A dark theme with subtle texture

Carta.name: Carta
Carta.description: Theme inspired by Sam Hewitt\'s Paper Theme (https://snwh.org/paper)

Faience.name: Faience+
Faience.description: A dark panel theme with light menus and blue highlighting

Divo.name: Divo
Divo.description: A light panel theme with dark highlighting

Cinnamox-Willow-Grove.name: Cinnamox-Willow-Grove
Cinnamox-Willow-Grove.description: Cinnamox-Willow-Grove features a soothing green colour scheme and light text. Cinnamon, Metacity, GTK2, GTK3.18 and GTK3.20+ themes are included along with several interactive bash scripts to allow end-users to tweak theme characteristics.

Thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
Thunderbolt.description: This theme is based mainly on the artwork and colors of the Atolm Gnome Sehell theme and my previous Tomcat theme.

SimpleDock.name: SimpleDock
SimpleDock.description: Simple centre zone dark dock to left, right and bottom, with adjacent right and left zones transparent.  Derived from Graphite Zero, with reduced rounding and menu border.  Suggest setting the \'dock\' panel to autohide or intelligent hide if you want the \'dock\' not to constrain the space for windows.  Please note that this does not bring all the functionality that a full blown dock would, it is still a standard panel

Glass-Mint-Classic.name: Glass-Glass-Mint-Classic
Glass-Mint-Classic.description: Semi-transparent theme with Mint colors and classic borders.

Eleganse-dark.name: Eleganse-dark
Eleganse-dark.description: A dark theme with elegant appeal

iOS-X.name: iOS-X
iOS-X.description: A iOS based Linux Mint theme!

Ambiance-Minty.name: Ambiance Minty
Ambiance-Minty.description: Old Minty with Ubuntu Orange over Mint Green (Cinnamon Theme Only)

New-Minty.name: New-Minty (with joined menus)
New-Minty.description: This is a fork of the New-Minty theme with some variations. Original author: zagortenary333 (https://zagortenay333.deviantart.com/)

Spider-Void.name: Spider-Void
Spider-Void.description: Spider-Void is a dramatic theme for Cinnamon

ChromeOS.name: Chrome OS
ChromeOS.description: Flat theme emulating the Chrome OS overall feel & look

Baldr.name: Baldr
Baldr.description: The ultimate light theme for Cinnamon

CBlack-Remix.name: CBlack-Remix
CBlack-Remix.description: Theme based on the official theme with Arc, recolored to match arc-dark

Photocopy.name: Photocopy
Photocopy.description: A theme with dark photocopier background on panels, menus and popups. Blue highlight on hover. A little margin around the menus to take them just off the panel. Fast animations

CBlack.name: CBlack
CBlack.description: The theme is based on Linux Mint Dark and includes the gtk/gtk+ theme.

Cinnamox-Rhino.name: Cinnamox-Rhino
Cinnamox-Rhino.description: Cinnamox-Rhino features a deep grey colour scheme and light text. Cinnamon, Metacity, GTK2, GTK3.18 and GTK3.20+ themes are included along with several interactive bash scripts to allow end-users to tweak theme characteristics.

Monternos.name: Monternos
Monternos.description: This theme is based on the iOS-X theme (https://cinnamon-spices.linuxmint.com/themes/view/iOS-X). With a new base panel and other small differences.

Jade-1.name: Jade-1
Jade-1.description: A fork of Adwaita with dark menus, light panels and mintgreen color accents.

Cinnamox-Aubergine.name: Cinnamox-Aubergine
Cinnamox-Aubergine.description: Cinnamox-Aubergine features a deep purple colour scheme and light text. Cinnamon, Metacity, GTK2, GTK3.18 and GTK3.20+ themes are included along with several interactive bash scripts to allow end-users to tweak theme characteristics.

Tomcat.name: Tomcat
Tomcat.description: Based mainly on default Cinnamon theme and nice GNOME Shell - Atolm theme

Jet-Gray.name: Jet-Gray
Jet-Gray.description: Mid grey panels and menus with jet black highlighting

Blue-mint.name: Blue mint
Blue-mint.description: A theme based on the Linux Mint and Wave themes

Pragmatic-Darker-Blue.name: Pragmatic-Darker-Blue
Pragmatic-Darker-Blue.description: Classic Mint-Y theme in blue colors

BelaLugosi.name: BelaLugosi
BelaLugosi.description: A straightforward default-cinnamon-but-darker panel theme, with red-tinged panels and popups, matched with a dark window theme. Left and Right panels are inset at top and bottom. The overall effect is part dark, with light window panels but all header and control bars dark.

Cinnamox-Gold-Spice.name: Cinnamox-Gold-Spice
Cinnamox-Gold-Spice.description: Cinnamox-Gold-Spice features a brown and golden orange colour scheme and light text. Cinnamon, Metacity, GTK2, GTK3.18 and GTK3.20+ themes are included along with several interactive bash scripts to allow end-users to tweak theme characteristics.

Windows-10.name: Windows 10 Light Theme
Windows-10.description: Simple theme to emulate Win10 on your Cinnamon machine.

Facebook.name: Facebook
Facebook.description: A theme, which looks like Facebook

CGreen.name: CGreen
CGreen.description: A semi-transparent Cinnamon theme, with  Firefox extra and Conky (see \'more info\' for details). Inspired by the CBlack theme.

Numix-Cinnamon-Transparent.name: Numix Cinnamon Transparent
Numix-Cinnamon-Transparent.description: Transparent version of Numix-Cinnamon Theme from zagortenay333 with shorter window list\'s tab.

Adapta.name: Adapta
Adapta.description: A light theme based on Material Design Guidelines. Cinnamon, Metacity, GTK2, GTK3.18, & GTK3.22 themes are included.

Railway.name: Railway
Railway.description: For those who like Doors 8 style, in spite of everything.

qob.name: qob
qob.description: Classy cinnamon theme which is based on Linux Mint with a lot of tweaks.

Tyr-jord.name: Tyr jord
Tyr-jord.description: Simple and sleek theme for Cinnamon in two variants: green (jord) and blue (himinn)

Cinnamox-Rosso-Cursa.name: Cinnamox-Rosso-Cursa
Cinnamox-Rosso-Cursa.description: Cinnamox-Rosso-Cursa features an exciting red colour scheme and light text. Cinnamon, Metacity, GTK2, GTK3.18 and GTK3.20+ themes are included along with several interactive bash scripts to allow end-users to tweak theme characteristics.

Adapta-Nokto.name: Adapta-Nokto
Adapta-Nokto.description: A dark theme based on Material Design Guidelines. Cinnamon, Metacity, GTK2, GTK3.18, & GTK3.22 themes are included.

Jade-1-Blue.name: Jade-1
Jade-1-Blue.description: A fork of Adwaita with dark menus, light panels and blue color accents.

Cinnamox-Kashmir-Blue.name: Cinnamox-Kashmir-Blue
Cinnamox-Kashmir-Blue.description: Cinnamox-Kashmir-Blue features a soothing blue colour scheme and light text. Cinnamon, Metacity, GTK2, GTK3.18 and GTK3.20+ themes are included along with several interactive bash scripts to allow end-users to tweak theme characteristics.

MGSE-Unity.name: MGSE-Unity
MGSE-Unity.description: This theme is missing an info.json

Windows-10-Basic.name: Windows-10-Basic
Windows-10-Basic.description: Windows 10 theme with comfortable spacings and minimalist styles.

Graphite-One.name: Graphite-One
Graphite-One.description: Dark gradient theme. Monochrome applet mouseover. Applet details are also monochrome. Monochrome menu wording that uses only shadow highlighting for comfortable menu scrolling.  Credit to theme Double Down by Frankula and Dewman 12. Theme Graphite-Zero is a green-tinged version of this.

Loki.name: Loki
Loki.description: Lean, mean and dark theme for Cinnamon

Ambiance-Crunchy.name: Ambiance Crunchy
Ambiance-Crunchy.description: It\'s an Ambiance like theme available in orange, blue, grey and green.

Numix-Cinnamon-Semi-Transparent.name: Numix Cinnamon SemiTransparent
Numix-Cinnamon-Semi-Transparent.description: Semi-Transparent version of Numix-Cinnamon-Transparent Theme from edoz90 with support for grouped windows list

Cinnamox-Heather.name: Cinnamox-Heather
Cinnamox-Heather.description: Cinnamox-Heather features a pale blue colour scheme and dark text. Cinnamon, Metacity, GTK2, GTK3.18 and GTK3.20+ themes are included along with several interactive bash scripts to allow end-users to tweak theme characteristics.
